Subject: Re: Destron Duality

From: Rudra656@...

::Cygnar::
    "With all due respect, I am the strategist, you lead on the battle field. 
 Your plan is good but it has flaws.  For one thing the distraction has no 
way to get away if something should go wrong.  His heavy armament is better 
suited for the main attack. The Destrocons make a better distraction because 
they can hit and run.  They also have flight capability making them more 
maneuverable."
